briefTitle: Open-label Extension Study in Patients 65 Years or Older With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia or Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma
officialTitle: An Open-label Extension Study in Patients 65 Years or Older With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) or Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma (SLL) Who Participated in Study PCYC-1115-CA (Ibrutinib Versus Chlorambucil)
summary: An Open-label Extension Study in Patients 65 Years or Older with Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) or Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma (SLL) Who Participated in Study PCYC-1115-CA (Ibrutinib versus Chlorambucil)

primaryOutcome.measure: Progression Free Survival (PFS) Based on Investigator Assessment
